Dear {{customer.firstName}},

Thank you for your interest in test driving the {{vehicle.year}} {{vehicle.make}} {{vehicle.model}}{{#if vehicle.trim}} {{vehicle.trim}}{{/if}}. We're excited to help you experience this vehicle firsthand!

**Scheduling Your Test Drive**
We have test drive appointments available Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 7:00 PM, and Saturday from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM. To schedule your test drive at a time that works best for you, please either:

- Call us directly at {{dealership.phone}}
- Reply to this email with your preferred date and time
- Visit our website at {{dealership.website}} and use our online scheduler

**What to Bring**
To ensure a smooth experience, please bring the following items for your test drive:

- A valid driver's license
- Proof of insurance
- Any co-signers (if applicable for financing)

**Before Your Visit**
{{#if vehicle.stockNumber}}We'll have the {{vehicle.year}} {{vehicle.make}} {{vehicle.model}} (Stock #{{vehicle.stockNumber}}) ready for you upon arrival. {{else}}We'll make sure to have the {{vehicle.year}} {{vehicle.make}} {{vehicle.model}} ready for you upon arrival. {{/if}}Our product specialists will provide a comprehensive overview of the vehicle's features and technology before your drive.

If you have any questions or special requirements before your visit, please don't hesitate to contact me directly at {{dealership.phone}}.

We look forward to welcoming you to {{dealership.name}} and helping you experience the {{vehicle.make}} {{vehicle.model}}!

Best regards,

Sales Team
{{dealership.name}}
{{dealership.phone}}
{{dealership.website}}
{{dealership.address}}
